CustomField.description: Defines the week number the timesheet entry falls in
CustomField.formula: IF( tc9_et__Start_Date__c - tc9_et__Timesheet__r.tc9_et__Start_Date__c < 7, 1, IF( AND((tc9_et__Start_Date__c - tc9_et__Timesheet__r.tc9_et__Start_Date__c < 14),(tc9_et__Start_Date__c - tc9_et__Timesheet__r.tc9_et__Start_Date__c >= 7)),2, IF( AND((tc9_et__Start_Date__c - tc9_et__Timesheet__r.tc9_et__Start_Date__c < 21),(tc9_et__Start_Date__c - tc9_et__Timesheet__r.tc9_et__Start_Date__c >= 14)),3, IF( AND((tc9_et__Start_Date__c - tc9_et__Timesheet__r.tc9_et__Start_Date__c < 28),(tc9_et__Start_Date__c - tc9_et__Timesheet__r.tc9_et__Start_Date__c >= 21)),4,0))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the week number the timesheet entry falls in
CustomField.label: Weekly Number
